snippet: Jordan Niebrugge won at Laurel Hill Golf Club in Lorton, Va. The winner of the event traditionally receives a spot in the Masters if he is still an amateur.
abstract: Oklahoma State sophomore Jordan Niebrugge wins United States Amateur Public Links at Laurel Hill Golf Club in Lorton, Va; winner of event traditionally receives spot in the Masters if he is still an amateur; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Niebrugge won at Laurel Hill Golf Club in Lorton, Va. The winner of the event traditionally receives a spot in the Masters if he is still an amateur.

headline.main: Oklahoma State Sophomore Wins United States Amateur Public Links
headline.print_headline: Public Links Winner Is Set for Augusta
